<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

This data source provides the Cassandra Backup Plans of the current Alibaba Cloud user.

> **NOTE:** Available in v1.128.0+.


{{% examples %}}

## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}





{{< example csharp >}}

```csharp
using Pulumi;
using AliCloud = Pulumi.AliCloud;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var example = Output.Create(AliCloud.Cassandra.GetBackupPlans.InvokeAsync(new AliCloud.Cassandra.GetBackupPlansArgs
        {
            ClusterId = "example_value",
        }));
        this.FirstCassandraBackupPlanId = example.Apply(example => example.Plans[0].Id);
    }

    [Output("firstCassandraBackupPlanId")]
    public Output<string> FirstCassandraBackupPlanId { get; set; }
}
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example go >}}

```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/sdk/v3/go/alicloud/cassandra"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		example, err := cassandra.GetBackupPlans(ctx, &cassandra.GetBackupPlansArgs{
			ClusterId: "example_value",
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		ctx.Export("firstCassandraBackupPlanId", example.Plans[0].Id)
		return nil
	})
}
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example python >}}

```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_alicloud as alicloud

example = alicloud.cassandra.get_backup_plans(cluster_id="example_value")
pulumi.export("firstCassandraBackupPlanId", example.plans[0].id)
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example typescript >}}


```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as alicloud from "@pulumi/alicloud";

const example = alicloud.cassandra.getBackupPlans({
    clusterId: "example_value",
});
export const firstCassandraBackupPlanId = example.then(example => example.plans[0].id);
```

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The start time of the backup task each day. The time is displayed in UTC and denoted by Z.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="clusterid_nodejs">
<a href="#clusterid_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">cluster<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The ID of the cluster for the backup.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="createtime_nodejs">
<a href="#createtime_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">create<wbr>Time</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The time when the backup plan was created.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="datacenterid_nodejs">
<a href="#datacenterid_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">data<wbr>Center<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The ID of the data center for the backup in the cluster.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="id_nodejs">
<a href="#id_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The ID of the Backup Plan.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="retentionperiod_nodejs">
<a href="#retentionperiod_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">retention<wbr>Period</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">number</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The duration for which you want to retain the backup. Valid values: 1 to 30. Unit: days.
{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}
